name: Terraswarm
description:
Defend your terraforming operation from some unruly local fauna.

Instructions
  • Spend ore to construct new facilities.
  • A new facility must be connected to an existing facility.
  • Extractors and cannons don't do anything unless you staff them with workers. To add/remove workers, hover over the facility and use left click or right click. The more workers you add, the more effective the facility will be.
  • The timeline in the upper right displaying incoming invasions.
  • Protect the Seed Facility for 10 minutes!
Facilities
  • Extractor: produces ore
  • Laser cannon: shoots things
  • Storage: lets you store more ore
  • Seed: the main terraforming unit
Credits
  • Dominic Dagradi
  • Stephen Foot
  • Jeff Lee

Created for Global Game Jam 2023
